file_insights.changes_summary: Updated 4 grid layout configurations to be responsive

grid_changes.context: category and status select fields grid
drawing reference and location fields grid

patterns_discovered.description: Consistent use of MUI's responsive breakpoints (xs, sm) to transform 2-column grids into single-column on mobile
patterns_discovered.implementation: gridTemplateColumns with breakpoint object: { xs: '1fr', sm: '1fr 1fr' }
patterns_discovered.applicability: Applied uniformly across all form grid layouts in RFIPage

patterns_discovered.description: Default to single column (xs) and expand to two columns at small breakpoint and above
patterns_discovered.benefit: Improves mobile usability by preventing cramped layouts on small screens

gotchas_discovered.description: All 4 grid instances follow identical responsive pattern, suggesting this was either a systematic refactoring or carefully replicated across the form
gotchas_discovered.implication: No inconsistencies found; pattern applied uniformly

approach_outcome.methodology: Direct grid configuration updates using MUI responsive breakpoints
approach_outcome.completeness: All identified grid layouts in RFIPage updated consistently
approach_outcome.scope: Single file modification with 4 targeted grid layout changes
approach_outcome.test_coverage: No explicit tests added; relies on visual inspection and MUI framework behavior

recommendations.recommendation: Consider extracting the responsive grid template pattern into a reusable constant or custom hook to reduce duplication
recommendations.rationale: The same breakpoint pattern appears 4 times; centralization would improve maintainability

recommendations.recommendation: Add responsive layout tests using breakpoint simulation to verify grid behavior at xs and sm breakpoints
recommendations.rationale: Current changes lack explicit test validation; automated tests would ensure responsive behavior persists

recommendations.recommendation: Document the responsive breakpoint strategy used in RFIPage for future developers
recommendations.rationale: Future maintainers should understand the xs-to-sm breakpoint strategy to maintain consistency
